channel.title: [317] Daphtion - Release [PI]
channel.description:
[center]Place the cache at your user.home
Client : [URL=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/27192218/Client.rar]Download[/URL] Server : [URL=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/27192218/Source.rar]Download[/URL] Cache : [URL=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/27192218/DaphtionV1.zip]Download[/URL]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/9ri6FoP.png[/img]
Welcome to Daphtion - Project Thread. The word 'Daphtion' isn't meaning anything and I like it myself than names with 'Scape' word. I'm beginner coder and all who thinks that I just leech: I'm not throwing (Ctrl + V) all features to my Project - I'm adding them with my brains so I know how I have done it. I also ask really much questions from Angerfist and he helps me best he can.
[B][SIZE=4][FONT=Fixedsys]Base:[/FONT][/SIZE][/B]
[I]Project Insanity[/I]
[B][SIZE=4][FONT=Fixedsys]Client & Source:[/FONT][/SIZE][/B]
[I]Marmaros[/I]
[B][SIZE=4][FONT=Fixedsys]Update Log:[/FONT][/SIZE][/B]
[code] ~1.5.2013~ - Downloaded Project Marmaros - Converted my old project commands.java to this one - Made mute command work
~4.5.2013~ - Added and edited teleports - Added bankers at Edgeville - Added NPC directions facing 2=N 3=S 4=E 5=W
~5.5.2013~ - Added Thieving stalls Edgeville - Added Thieving Store - Changed Dungeoneering teleport to Modern teleport - Added Clipped Following - Redone Quest Tab
~6.5.2013~
- Added monsters to Slayer Tower - Removed 10X Hits - Slayer Tower monsters now give Slayer XP when killed - Edited Starter Kit - Removed old Slayer
~8.5.2013~
- Finally got .jar client fully working! - Voting added
~9.5.2013~
- Fixed 602 Skill tab - Voting works now
~11.5.2013~
- Unique barrows added
~12.5.2013~
- Added Warriors Guild base - Improved Jad - New mining with timer - Bank deposit boxes works now - Hill Giant dungeon added - Dragon dungeon added - Added clipped firemaking
~13.5.2013~
- Added Barbarian Course - 2 starters per IP - Added Agility Ticket system
~14.5.2013~
- Added Vote Shop - Made antique lamps work
~15.5.2013~
- Added new shop interface - Added more exp lamps in Vote shop
~16.5.2013~
- Added 602 NPCs
~19.5.2013~
- New crafting - Added Comp cape - Added right click mute
~20.5.2013~
- Fixed some models (Green Tree, magic log, small fishing net)
~21.5.2013~
- Added 634 maps
~22.5.2013~
- Added lottery system - Added 99 achievement message
~25.5.2013~
- A lot new teleports added [/code]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/9ri6FoP.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=3][FONT=Fixedsys]Media:[/FONT][/SIZE][/B]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oOV5SI8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/48Trm4E.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/81RcWft.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7rWIeOb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hgLg7uJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Y0HZFKk.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/zEAxYON.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/fkQ1pKP.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8TpHz6a.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/w1ZrFhy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2pPAW9x.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lGAQcmW.png[/img]
Sanity Galkon Demonhorn Angerfist Pegasus Brighter [/align][/center]

Been using it myself xD[/quote]

I thought about it for a while I might I am not sure yet currently I am stuck on Ventus by play boy the links will never be posted again the one he released was out for like 2 weeks to a month. I got the oringal copy that he released to 3-5 people working bank tabs and bounty hunter ftw

When i press run i’m gettin this error ‘‘connection error - retrying in …’’
Any idea??
Skype: jack.mills1337
[/quote]

Put the cache in your local user directory, not C:, it’s supposed to be in C:\Users{youruserhere}\

Anyways, seems like barbarian assault gets stuck, and construction, hunter, dungeoneering are “coming”. Got an idea? And if I want to implement snippets, what release number is that? 508? 602?

Thanks in advance![/quote]
its already there… :s Can you help me with skype/teamview?

item.title: [317] Daphtion - Release [PI]
item.dc:creator: @minisurma minisurma
item.description:
@minisurma wrote:

This source has very much to do atleast in my opinion.

  1. Running doesen’t work very well.
  2. If you try to activate prayer and level isn’t enough you get weird chat (easy to fix)
  3. mage book has Sap Warrior -prayer icon (easy to fix)
  4. If you click on object at agility arena and you face wrong direction you get stuck.
  5. Wide screen should be added.
  6. Construction, Hunter, Summoning and dungeoneering should be added.
  7. Gwds must be added
  8. home teleport should be fixed
  9. world map should be added if sum1 wants it.
  10. Doors, gates bank and npcs should be fixed…
    And list just goes on…

Read full topic
